attributes.action: Give Steve Fletcher of AFC Bournemouth a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The guy is a legend and should be rewarded in kind.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
